title: of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) comes into
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 

(Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited public health (alcohol) act 2018 (commencement) order 2021

title: of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) comes into
heading: 2. The 4th day of January 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 11
text_raw:
2. The 4th day of January 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 11 
of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) comes into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 May, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [230] 3
text_norm: 2 4th day january 2022 appointed day section 11 public health (alcohol) act 2018 (no 24 2018) come operation given official seal 10 may 2021 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 14th may 2021 230 3

title: of the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 (No. 24 of 2018) comes into
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Order is to commence section 11 of the Public Health 
(Alcohol) Act 2018. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [230]
